extendedInfo.description: Med Helper Pro keeps track of prescriptions, alarms remind you when medications need to be taken, notify you when Doctors appointments are scheduled and alert you when meds are running low or are about to expire. Med Helper Pro also tracks your vital signs and PRN / take-as-needed medications. You can log and export reports to your Doctor, Nurse or Caregiver and multiple profiles let you manage others in your care. Whether youâre self managing or taking care of your loved ones Med Helper Pro is easy to use and there to help. Itâs like having your very own Mobile Healthcare Assistant.Depending on your needs, Med Helper Pro's features can help you manage very simple to very complex situations. Med Helper Features include: Prescription list- Name- Medication Alias- RX Number- Instructions- Reason- Description- Side EffectsSchedule- Start date- End date- Schedule pattern- Reminder Times / Alarm set- Snooze - Taken atInventory - Refills Remaining- Current inventory- Expiration DateContact - Doctor- PharmacyDaily Schedule- Time of Day- Dosage - Calendar viewTake as needed (PRN)- Amount taken- Time taken- Last 10 doses / 24/hrMed Log- Daily view- Calendar view- Able to manageVitals Tracked- Part of day- Exercise- Temperature- Weight- Pulse- Glucose- HbA1c- Pain levels- Blood Pressure- OxygenExportable ReportsPeople use Med Helper as a:  Medication reminder - Prescription tracker - Pill reminder - Vitals tracker - Doctor or Pharmacist appointment manager - RX reminder - Med reminder - Medication monitor and reports tracker - Medicine reminder - Medicine scheduler - virtual Pillbox - Individual or family medication reminder - Symptom tracker - Doctors list and Pharmacy organizer as well as a way to share information with their caregivers.How ever you choose to use Med Helper we hope it helps make your life a little bit easier. Med Helper Pro is being designed by people just like you. Over the past two years we've received thousands of emails with suggestion comments and reviews. People let us know what they like - what they want and sometimes what they don't like. We listen and design accordingly. Our belief is that Better Healthcare Needs Better Tools... and better tools are best designed by those who use them. Meaning YOU. For any information, suggestions or help of any kind please contact us at:  info@medhelperapp.com We're at your service....Note: No network connection is required for Med Helper Pro to operate.All the best - From the Med Helper Team

reviews.title: Pill schedule and log are worth the price alone
reviews.comment: If you forget to take meds you need this app. Check out planned features on the website. I love that cross platform communication is planned. Your computer, tablet and phone will sync in the future.  (A check box to disable network when not using it would be nice.)
reviews.author: David Da

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This has been great for helping me take my meds I  time. The extra traditional g and data that you can store it awesome. One tiny this I would like to see is the ability to mark a prescription schedule taken from the notification bar, similar to how the newer Gmail works.
reviews.author: Clint Eschberger

reviews.title: Very Helpful, only missing one option.
reviews.comment: No bugs and does it\'s job.   I do wish it had an option to set a default profile. I only have my husband in there in case of an emergency where I would need to know his allergies and current medications. Other than that I don\'t touch his profile.  Still gets 5 stars for doing as it is intended and I love the new updates to the overall looks of the app.
reviews.author: Loriann Ellwood

reviews.title: The Ultimate !!!
reviews.comment: PLS NOTE:  I wrote this for the prior release running on my now dead HTC. Will update for current release/phone.  This puppy does it all, and does it well.  It schedules/reminds doses, tracks inventories, exports reports and/or data. And provides timely email support.  My only complaint, albeit minor, is the inability to cut/paste which would ease scheduling & reporting.  First app that truly deserves 6 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only 4 since on S4 alarms skip occasionally
reviews.comment: Great app, but alarms have skipped:they do not show as green but have not shown up in status bar. Happens once a week. I have 2 alarms set daily. Still the best app on the market.
reviews.author: Ashok Bhagwanani

reviews.title: Wonderful. I need more Stars, 5 aren\'t enough!
reviews.comment: The Very Best Med/ Doc/Appointment manager out there. I\'m on 20+ meds/vits myself for my Head, Heart, Lungs, Butt, and Joints. Most have to be taken at different times and some are a \'choice\' from 3 or 4; some depend on my \'choice\', and some on how they are delivered, which affects others. This app, which I\'ve been using for several months now, has made my life so easy keeping track of my meds, inventory, Dr apps., when to order, I don\'t have to have my brain cluttered with keeping up and can work on other things. AND I am able to email my GP exactly what is going on - Everything. He Loves it. Support is AAA+. Report a problem and it\'s fixed fast.  Also, if you are an M$ Health Vault person, the reporting feature is just what the Dr. Ordered.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: This app is fantastic! I just got out of the hospital & am on about 20 medications. This app has helped so much with organizing my meds & makin sure I take them on time. What a life saver!
reviews.author: Marissa Knack

reviews.title: Looks great for my needs
reviews.comment: I\'ve recently been diagnosed with lymphoma so of course I now have a large amount of pills and medicines to take to manage pain and side effects of chemo. This app provides all the help I need to track my pills and myself, extremely helpful for me and my family.
reviews.author: Kiefer Moore

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I\'m a terminally ill cancer patient on hospice care. This app reminds me when I need to take my meds, and when I need to order refills, thr reporting function allows my nurses to see exactly when, and how much, of my breakthrough pain meds I have needed. This allows them to better set my baseline pain meds, leading to significantly better overall pain management!   I tried multiple different medicine management tools on both IOS and android, each of them was missing one or more major functions.
reviews.author: Keith Jackson

reviews.title: this is wonderful
reviews.comment: it works really well and keeps me on time with my pain medicine.  thank you for such a wonderful app
reviews.author: George Ann Gash

reviews.title: It\'s the best one available
reviews.comment: I must of tried every one available but this one caters for everything except for drug information and identification but there are lots of apps that do that as a stand alone app.   Med helper has everything you need to keep records of things from tablets to to appointments and they all have reminders. So if you are like me and take lots of medications and have lots of doctor and hospital appointments then this is the app you need. It\'s one of the few apps I\'ve paid for.  The only thing I don\'t like about it is the reminder it would be great to have an option in days and hours as well as minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The only med tracker that does what I need it to!
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Note 8 Most of the med tracking apps are  just glorified reminders. This is the only one I could find that also lets me input pharmacy and doctor info - in addition to scheduling and inventory info - and makes it really easy and intuitive to link them all together in a practical, usable way.  It has a very clean, easy to see interface and works well on my tablet. It will get 5 stars when I can change the scheduled time of a med w/out it adding a duplicate entry for days past.
reviews.author: Laura Sharkey

reviews.title: A must have for anyone taking daily meds!!
reviews.comment: I have the worst time remembering to take pills and to log info but this app allows me to not just set reminders but specify the notification sound and repeat intervals in case I don\'t hear it immediately AND makes it so easy to record symptoms and when things are taken and helps to refill when needed!  It took trying several others that didn\'t cut it but I finally found a winner! Totally worth the money! Thanks for the great app!
reviews.author: Angela Thole

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Easy to use. All important info in one place. Excellent. Great record keeping. #Awesome
reviews.author: Barry Winn

reviews.title: At last... I can get back to living life!
reviews.comment: Perfect for the person who is easily distracted and forgetful. This app has given me the ability to get back to some sort of normal life, without being consumed by planning my activities around my medication schedule. As long as I keep my meds nearby, this app keeps me on schedule. Absolutely the best med reminder available. Hands down.
reviews.author: Todd Powers

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love the new colors and the dark theme!  Can see much better!
reviews.author: Daniel Butler
